content: welcome to this year s baah yarn love your store 2024 shawl garter me this shawl name is a play on batman s s nemesis the riddler and his famous taunt riddle me this this pattern is so versatile you can use any weight to knit it up and truly follow the pattern or make it larger it s totally up to you you are the master of your own shawl the pattern is designed to use up every inch of 3 skeins of baah lajolla if you decide to fringe it garter ridges with a simple kfb increase you can fade it however you wish picture shown is just one example of how the colors can be interchanged https //www danafehrenbachdesigns com/ follow me on instagram @therunawayknitter
